structure.unit: ARTICLE VI. MIAMI-DADE WATER AND SEWER AUTHORITY DEPARTMENT BILLING PROCEDURES

law.catch_line: Application to Metro-Miami-Dade Water and Sewer Utility and other acquisitions of Metropolitan Miami-Dade County.

text.section:
Sec. 32-98. Application to Metro-Miami-Dade Water and Sewer Utility and other acquisitions of Metropolitan Miami-Dade County.
The provisions of this article shall be applicable to the water and sewer systems owned by Metropolitan Miami-Dade County and operated by the Department, including the Metro-Miami-Dade Water and Sewer Utility, and shall also be applicable to any other water or sewer utility which may be acquired by the County.
